channel.title: Hardware on klosterbruders tech rants
channel.description: Recent content in Hardware on klosterbruders tech rants

item.title: Not all cables are created equally
item.description: After a long time of planning, I finally ordered parts for a new PC last year. Black Friday seemed the best time to order, even though there were less deals than I’d have wanted. While waiting for my orders to be shipped, I also found out the availability numbers in the shops were a bit overstated. That might be worth a rant for itself, but sometimes one should just let bygones be bygones.
